title: folders whose name includes special characters lose the shared icon
body:
### expected behaviour
no matter what characters a folder name includes that the shared feature should not disappear.

### actual behaviour
those folders that include special characters are not correctly shared, see steps to reproduce it

### steps to reproduce
1. loggin as user1, create a folder whose name includes special characters, such as @ or .
2.- select to share it with user2
3.- check, using another web browser, that the folder is correctly shared with user2
4.- refresh the user1 account
5.- the "shared icon" is not any longer shown, although if we click on it, we see that that folder is shared with user2, indeed, it is still available on the shared folder on user2

### server configuration
acceptance-testing master_on_apache_with_sqlite
"version":"4.96.10","versionstring":"5.0 rc 2"

### client configuration
browser: firefox and chrome
